name: Genomancer
description:
You’re a Genomancer, whose abilities are controlled by your unstable genome. Your genome is composed of codons - the four elements, and a stop codon. You can have up to 4 abilities, and passive effects. The abilities are encoded by unique codon combinations, and any “excess” codons improve the ability.

Kill endless waves of enemies, and every few levels, mutate - voluntarily or not!

Controls:
  • Move: WSAD
  • Ability 1: Left Mouse Button
  • Ability 2: Right Mouse Button
  • Ability 3: Q
  • Ability 4: E
Effects on player:
  • Earth: max health
  • Water: max mana
  • Fire: bonus damage
  • Air: movement speed
Effects on abilitites:
  • Earth: splash damage
  • Water: lower mana cost
  • Fire: bonus damage
  • Air: lower cooldown
Here’s the list of abilities, if you don’t want to figure them out yourself (F: Fire, W: Water, E: Earth, A: Air, S: Stop):
  • F - Fireball
  • FF - Fireblast
  • FA - Firestorm
  • FFF - Chaosbolt
  • W - Water Cannon
  • WW - Bubbles
  • WWA - Snowball
  • WA - Frostbolt
  • E - Earth Spike
  • EE - “Earthquake”
  • A - Wind Strike
  • AA - Hurricane
  • AF - Lightning Bolt

So, for example, if your genome is the following:

FFW S WAA S EEEEEWW

This means you have 2 abilities, and character passives:

  • Fireblast with lowered mana cost
  • Frostbolt with lowered cooldown
  • 50 health and 20 mana from the rightmost gene. Be careful, there is no base health or base mana. If you lose all earth codons from your passives, you’ll have 0 max health and die.

So, how do mutations work? Every 3 levels (later on, every 2 levels) you can select a mutation:

  • adding a codon - a new codon is inserted before your selection - probably the one you’re going to choose the most,
  • substituting a codon - the selected codon is replaced by a new one,
  • removing a codon - the selected codon is removed,
  • inverting part of your genome - the entire part of genome between your first and second selected codon is inverted,
  • swapping 2 codons - two codons swap their places.

You also mutate randomly every 3 (later on, 2) levels.

Play now!
